Access Manager
Help






Oracle Access Manager Error

%1

About Product | Legal Notices | Terms of Use | Your Privacy Rights
302 Redirect
Bad Oracle Access Manager Request

HTTP Error 401

401 Unauthorized: Logon Failed

This error indicates that the credentials passed to the server do not match the credentials required to log on to the server.

Please contact the Web server's administrator to verify that you have permission to access the requested resource.
403 Forbidden

HTTP Error 404

404 Not Found

The Web server cannot find the file or script you asked for. Please check the URL to ensure that the path is correct.

Please contact the server's administrator if this problem persists.

Oracle Access Manager Operation Error

Contact your website administrator to remedy this problem.
The WebGate AccessXML Proxy is unable to contact any AccessXML Servers. Check that the AccessXMLProxy.lst file has been set up.
No Trust Relation With Associate Domain!
No Trust Relation With Main Domain!
Untrusted Associate cookie!
Untrust Main Domain token!
The redirection URL %1 defined for authentication failure itself requires authentication. It should be unprotected.
A plugin for the authentication scheme %1 has aborted processing credentials.
A plugin for the authentication scheme %1 has denied authentication for credentials.
The plugins configured for the authentication scheme %1 did not select a user profile.
Access to the URL %2 has been denied for user.
The redirection URL %1 defined for authorization failure itself failed authorization. It should be unprotected or accessible by any one.
The authentication scheme used for login is unknown to the WebGate plug-in. The scheme mask is %1.
The HTTP Authorization header does not have the expected format for basic authentication.
The end_url in the logout request is either malformed or not in trusted domains.
The logoutRedirectUrl parameter does not begin with http:// or https:// or results in redirect loop.
The redirection URL %2 defined in the authentication scheme %1 does not begin with http:// or https:// or results in redirect loop.
The WebGate plug-in is unable to contact any Access Servers.
DCC Context Cookie in requested URL is exceeding the maximum limit allowed.
The requested URL %1 contains illegal characters.
An exception has occurred in the Access Server.
The login form %1 defined for form authentication itself requires form authentication. It should be unprotected.
The host and port from the requested URL could not be found in the Policy database. Check if the corresponding directory service is up.
The certificate used for the login is invalid.
The authentication scheme %1 is invalid or has been disabled.

The mapping of credentials to a user profile failed. The Access Server may not be able to connect to the user directory, or the authentication scheme %1 may have an invalid obMappingFilter parameter for its credential_mapping plugin.
The authentication scheme %1 has invalid configured parameters.
The authentication scheme %1 is missing a configured authentication plugin.
The authentication scheme %1 is missing a configured authentication step.
The credentials used for the login are missing a required certificate.
The authentication scheme %1 is missing the required ObCredentialPassword parameter in its validate_password plugin.
The credentials used for the login are missing a required password.
The redirection URL %2 defined for secure authentication in the authentication scheme %1 is not https.
There is no authentication scheme defined for the policy rule or domain that applies to the requested URL and operation.
The Access Server has returned a fatal error with no detailed information.
The form authentication scheme %1 does not have a challenge parameter form:formURL, where formURL is the URL of the login form.
Failed to get record for sequence number %1. Ignoring the error.
The credentials used in the login do not correspond to a user profile in the Identity System.
The credentials used in the login correspond to more than one user profile in the Identity System. The correspondence must be unique.
The requested URL is empty.
The user with credentials has not been logged in due to a change of password requirement.
The password for credentials has already expired.
The post data exceeds the maximum configurable limit for authentication scheme.
The cookie %1 is reserved for use by Oracle Access Manager and has been used with incorrect parameters.
The URL is reserved for use by Oracle Access Manager and has been used with incorrect parameters.
The policy domain that includes the requested URL could not be found in the Policy database. Check if the corresponding directory service is up.
The authentication scheme protecting %1 requires a secure connection. Try accessing with the 'https://' protocol. Contact your Access Manager administrator if this problem persists.
Unable to process the request due to unexpected error.
The Access Server has returned a status that is unknown to WebGate.
The requested URL could not be mapped to a policy domain in the Policy database. Check if the corresponding directory service is up.
User with credentials has been locked out due to exceeded number of login attempts
The user corresponding to the credentials used in the login has been revoked by an administrator of the Access System.
The authentication scheme for the policy rule that applies to the requested URL and operation could not be found in the Policy database. Check if the corresponding directory service is up.
The policy rule that applies to the requested URL and operation could not be found in the Policy database. Check if the corresponding directory service is up.
The wrong password was specified for the credentials.
Only Apache based webgate can use SERVER_NAME as preferred host.
Apache based webgate must use SERVER_NAME as preferred host to enable virtual hosting.
Bad mode in call to webgate method
Language initialization failed in webgate method
Unable to load shared object in webgate method
Exception re-thrown from webgate method
Exception re-thrown from webgate method
Exception re-thrown from webgate method
Symbol lookup failed in webgate method
Exception while synchronizing caches: %1

Bad Oracle Access Manager Request

%1

Oracle Access Manager Operation Error

%1

Contact your website administrator to remedy this problem.

HTTP Error 401

401.1 Unauthorized: Logon Failed

This error indicates that the credentials passed to the server do not match the credentials required to log on to the server.

Please contact the Web server's administrator to verify that you have permission to access the requested resource.

HTTP Error 404

404 Not Found

The Web server cannot find the file or script you asked for. Please check the URL to ensure that the path is correct.

Please contact the server's administrator if this problem persists.
The authentication scheme %1 has an invalid selection filter in its selection filter plugin.
An incorrect Username or Password was specified.
The password has expired. Please contact the System Administrator.
An incorrect Username or Password was specified.
Unexpected Error occurred while processing credentials. Please retry your action again!
System error. Please contact the System Administrator.
The user account is locked or disabled. Please contact the System Administrator.
The user has already reached the maximum allowed number of sessions. Please close one of the existing sessions before trying to login again.
System error. Please re-try your action. If you continue to get this error, please contact the Administrator.
Authentication failed.
System error. Please re-try your action. If you continue to get this error, please contact the Administrator.
